===Appearance===
Amano wears a standard uniform modeled from the ''{{w|ashigaru}}'' of feudal Japan. He wears a purple-gray ''{{w|shitagi}}'', gray ''kobakama'', white socks, and ''{{w|waraji}}'' sandals. His eggplant-colored armor with gray accents consists of ''dou'' (breastplate) with the [[Inazuma Shogunate]]'s crest, ''han-kote'' (half-armored sleeves), ''haidate'' (thigh guards), and ''sune-ate'' (greaves). He is equipped with a ''juumonji yari'' (cross-shaped spear), whose shaft is lavender colored, and contains the Shogunate crest under the spearhead.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Amano:''' Hello, how can I help you?
;(Before completing [[Transient Dreams]])
:{{DIcon}} May I ask about the [[Ei|Almighty Shogun]]?
::'''Amano:''' The fame of the Almighty Shogun spreads afar throughout the world. She keeps the eternal peace in Inazuma.
::'''Amano:''' About the [[Sakoku Decree]] though... No, never mind. I have no problem with that.
::'''Amano:''' Of course it's better that we have fewer outlanders to deal with. For the lucky few such as yourself who have come to Inazuma, you must follow the rules here.

;(After completing Transient Dreams)
:{{DIcon}} May I ask about the [[Ei|Almighty Shogun]]?
::'''Amano:''' The fame of the Almighty Shogun spreads afar throughout the world. She keeps the eternal peace in Inazuma.
::'''Amano:''' I have never once questioned a single one of the Shogun's decisions.
::'''Amano:''' Even if the Sakoku Decree has been abolished, outlanders who come to Inazuma must follow the its laws.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye...
::'''Amano:''' Goodbye, outlander.
{{Dialogue End}}
